srl.project
Class SrlProject

java.lang.Object
  srl.project.SrlProject

public class SrlProject
extends java.lang.Object

The Srl Project is used to group together all data used by SRL system

The tools used for linguistic processing, i.e., tokenizer, splitter

entities

public ListenableList<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> entities
The types of entities used in the project. eg nameed entities for diseases may be represented as a pair [ "name", "disease" ]

corpus

public Corpus corpus
The corpus object. This is null if the project was created with openCorpus=false

                  java.io.IOException
Create a new (empty) SRL project

Parameters:
path - The path where this is located
processor - The analyzer used for this corpus
openCorpus - If this is false no corpus is created

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If path exists and is not an empty directory
java.io.IOException - If a disk error occurred
